title: New: LAY BAC – With You, With Me
body:
We’ve known for a while that Texan duo **LAY BAC** are crazy bros; from their electrifying music to their sexually provocative videos, these dudes know how to party, however new cut _With You, With Me_ takes the mindfxck to all new levels.

Opening with three short blasts, the track seemingly samples itself several times, before tumbling and twisting into dance-your-feet-off 80’s inspired number. The vocal samples are never more than a matter of milliseconds and the pitch-bending comes in somewhere between 8-bit and **Dilla**. Fucking fantastic.

Check out _With You, With Me_ below, and watch out for _**Short Cuts**_ released through _ZOOM LENS_ later this month.

 [WITH YOU, WITH ME](http://soundcloud.com/tomcruisin/with-you-with-me) by [LAY BAC](http://soundcloud.com/tomcruisin)
